Name:
Ouragan
Ouragan
Ouragan
Fate:
Loaned to Poland
Returned to the Free French, 30 April 1941
Scrapped, 1949
Displacement:
1,320 t (1,300 long tons) (standard)
1,825 t (1,796 long tons) (full load)
Installed power:
31,000 PS (22,800 kW; 30,576 shp)
3 du Temple boilers
Range: 3,000 nmi (5,600 km; 3,500 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
4 × single 130 mm (5.1 in) guns
1 × single 75 mm (3 in) anti-aircraft guns
2 × triple 550 mm (21.7 in) torpedo tubes
2 chutes for 16 depth charges
